rows.label: bf08180100_0020
rows.name: They are born from Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf08180100_0030
rows.name:
And when their fire burns out...
they return to the Divine Beast that bore them.

rows.label: bf08180100_0040
rows.name:
Eventually, the Blades that return, transform
into Divine Beasts themselves.

rows.label: bf08180100_0060
rows.name: We'll end up like that, eventually?

rows.label: bf08180100_0090
rows.name: The new Divine Beast has no memory of its life as a Blade.

rows.label: bf08180100_0100
rows.name: Just like returning to a core.

rows.label: bf08180100_0120
rows.name:
They died along with their mother.
Shared her fate.
